# numberOfSections

**Instance Property**

The number of sections in the table view.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor var numberOfSections: Int { get }
```

## Discussion

[doc://com.apple.uikit/documentation/UIKit/UITableView] gets the value in this property from its data source and caches it.

## Getting the number of rows and sections

- **numberOfRows(inSection:)**: Returns the number of rows (table cells) in a specified section.

items.description: Returns the number of rows (table cells) in a specified section.
items.name: numberOfRows(inSection:)
